Articles.Content:
So I've come back from a 5 month hiatus and I noticed that nothing says fuel cross feed anymore sooo did they get rid of specific part cross feed or what?

Edited April 12, 2014 by locustgate
Only parts that do not crossfeed have it mentioned in their part descriptions. Any part without mention of crossfeed has it enabled.

Are you playing the latest version? (Really, this shouldn't matter, but you might as well be playing the ARM updated version.) There are parts which are not fuel cross feed capable, and that is indicated in the VAB/ SPH.

Edit: ninja'd!
